name: GenericValidator_minLengthTest
description: Unit tests for the minLength method in GenericValidator with and without line ending adjustment.

test_cases.name: testMinLength_WithLineEndingAdjustment
test_cases.description: Tests the minLength method with line ending adjustment, expecting the result to be true.

test_cases.name: testMinLength_WithoutLineEndingAdjustment
test_cases.description: Tests the minLength method without line ending adjustment, expecting the result to be false.
